title: Bumper Insurance Cover
discription: Ensure lifelong protection for your family, even in your absence, with Life Cover of up to 125 times your annual premium.

title: 360 Degree Protection with RIDERS
discription: You also receive additional protection through Accidental Death coverage, Accidental Disability coverage, and critical illness coverage to provide financial security for your family in the event of an unfortunate incident.

title: Beat Inflation with market-linked investment
discription: Based on your risk tolerance, you have the flexibility to invest in a different asset classes and multiple funds.

title: Return of charges
discription: Return of 2-3xMortality charges, 2x Premium allocation charges, 2x Policy Administration charges

title: Maturity Booster
discription: Policy rewards your loyalty and helps you earn more by adding 20% additional units to your fund at the end of your policy term

title: Partial Withdrawal & Surrender without any charges
discription: After Completion of 5 policy years will give you facility of free withdrawal without any charges.

title: Tax Benefits*
discription: Avail tax deductions up to â‚¹ 1.5 lakh on premiums paid under the policy as per Section 80C and returns received under the policy are exempt subject to Section 10(10D).
